statements: UPDATE PhishingLogs SET date_time = now() WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE PhishingLogs SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE PhishingLogs SET ip_address='192.168.1.100', user_id=101 WHERE log_id=5;
UPDATE PhishingLogs SET date_time='2022-11-30 15:30:00', phishing_email_id=20 WHERE user_id=105 AND ip_address='10.20.30.40';
UPDATE phishing_emails SET fall_for_phishing = TRUE WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ip_addresses SET user_id = 100, timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.10';
UPDATE phishing_emails SET email_address='john.doe@example.com', fall_for_phishing=TRUE WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ip_addresses SET user_id=10, timestamp='2022-05-10 12:00:00' WHERE ip_address='192.168.0.1';
UPDATE phishing_emails SET email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_attempts SET success = true, timestamp = '2021-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phishing_emails SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE exploitation_logs SET exploitation_details = 'Details updated' WHERE email_id = 2 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
UPDATE user_info SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'clicked' WHERE user_id = 2 AND email_id = 3;
UPDATE user_info SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_actions SET action_type = 'clicked', action_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND email_id = 789;
UPDATE phishing_emails SET sender_email = 'attacker@example.com' WHERE email_id = 1;
UPDATE user_ips SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100' WHERE ip_id = 3;
UPDATE phishing_emails SET email_content = 'New phishing content', timestamp = NOW() WHERE email_id = 1;
UPDATE user_ips SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', timestamp = NOW() WHERE ip_id = 3;
